name: My summer moped
description:
Welcome to the world of simplified motorcycle building! In this casual Unity game, you have the opportunity to assemble your own motorcycle from a wide variety of modular pieces. Choose the perfect motor, customize your colours, and make sure your bike is road-ready before you take it out for a spin.

With simplified physics and mechanics, you'll feel like a motorcycle mechanic as you put together your dream bike. And once your motorcycle is complete, the fun doesn't stop there. Take your creation out on the open road and experience the difficulty of driving a machine that you built with your own two hands.

Similar to the popular game "My Summer Car," this game offers an casual and engaging experience that will keep you coming back for more. With a wide variety of parts and customization options, you can create a truly unique motorcycle that reflects your own personal style.

So why wait? Start building your motorcycle today!

Note, the game is in slow development and expect bugs from the prototype.
